trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There was one other sighting in Colorado Springs on or around November 1st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsTom is a professional driver and runs a driving school. He lives north central Colorado Springs. He was outside at work and looked to the southeast in the direction of Schriver AFB. At an angle of 50-60 degrees above the horizon, he thought he was seeing a kite. However, it was at something like 10,000 feet altitude. He knew that noone could have a kite string that long. He said it was Chevron shaped and had some sort of a tail that trailed off to the east. He said it ocscillated slowly. Suddenly, a jet was headed in the direction of the object. He yelled for two other people to come out and see it. Just then the plane, its contrail and the object all disappeared. They scanned the sky everywhere and nothing ever returned. He would welcome a call from COMUFON. He is a real solid sounding person. This reminds me of the incident about 5 years ago when Georgia State Director Walter Sheets and three of his investigators were driving down the road and saw something similar. They were shocked when the plane just disappeard.
